thread.title: ForeFront Announces Sponsorship of MaxLive Europe 2015
thread.title_full: ForeFront Announces Sponsorship of MaxLive Europe 2015

author: Allie Burnaford
title: ForeFront Announces Sponsorship of MaxLive Europe 2015
text:
ForeFront , a Global Systems Integrator (GSI) and cloud solutions provider, is excited to announce its 2nd annual appearance and sponsorship of the MaxLive Europe event this November 3rd to 4th at the Intercontinental Le Grand Hotel in Paris. ForeFront will be leading discussions on field service transformations across industries, across platforms and across oceans. With recognized clients like GE, Ricoh and Elekta, ForeFront continues to break into global markets with awarded solutions by empowering customers with cloud smart solutions that deliver tangible business outcomes. Specifically, ForeFront will be addressing today’s most complex field service challenges, uncovering innovative stories of:
 Field Service solutions in a multinational economy Optimized field change orders End-to-end service value chain management Global compliance and tax implications Improved customer centricity through SLA and entitlement automation Best-practice knowledge transfer with a growing skills gap Increased adoption through intuitive, mobile solutions
This event will not only supercharge your employees with new strategies and technologies, but will also be a great opportunity to network with industry experts and share best practices. "This event proved to be extremely valuable to ForeFront last year, allowing us to showcase our innovative field service cloud solutions while reaffirming our commitment to addressing key challenges faced by global field service organizations," says Anne Marie Berger, Managing Partner of ForeFront. Through educational sessions, roundtable discussions, keynotes and breakout sessions, attendees will have the chance to learn all the innovative applications to maximize returns on their field service investments and transform their own business.
About ForeFront
ForeFront delivers forward thinking cloud solutions to clients across the Life Sciences, High Tech, Media, and Retail industries. ForeFront has been recognized by tech leaders like Salesforce, ServiceMax, IBM and Microsoft for their innovative application of cloud technology across platforms. ForeFront’s expertise spans from cloud, mobile and internet of things with an emphasis on strategic cloud advisory, custom development and global field solution deployment know-how. ForeFront is located in the New York metro area with worldwide market reach. For more information, visit http://www.forefrontcorp.com/ .
